short.ar: شارك ملفات تعريف الارتباط لحساب موقعك مع أصدقائك دون مشاركة كلمة المرور
short.am: የይለፍ ቃል ሳያጋሩ የድር ጣቢያ መለያ ኩኪዎችን ከጓደኞችዎ ጋር ያጋሩ።
short.bg,ca,da,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,et,: Share your website account cookies to your friends without login and password
short.bn: পাসওয়ার্ড ছাড়াই বন্ধুদের সাথে আপনার ওয়েবসাইট অ্যাকাউন্টের কুকিজ শেয়ার করুন।
short.cs: Sdílejte cookies svého účtu webových stránek s přáteli bez sdílení hesla.
short.de: Teilen Sie Ihre Website-Account-Cookies mit Freunden ohne Passwort.
short.el: Μοιραστείτε cookies λογαριασμού ιστοσελίδας με φίλους χωρίς να μοιράζεστε τον κωδικό πρόσβασης.
short.es: Comparte las cookies de tu cuenta web con amigos sin compartir la contraseña.
short.fa: کوکی‌های حساب وب‌سایت خود را بدون اشتراک‌گذاری رمز عبور با دوستان به اشتراک بگذارید.
short.fr: Partagez les cookies de votre compte avec vos amis sans partager le mot de passe.
short.gu: પાસવર્ડ શેર કર્યા વિના તમારા વેબસાઇટ એકાઉન્ટના કૂકીઝ મિત્રો સાથે શેર કરો.
short.hi: पासवर्ड के बिना लॉगिन किए अपने वेबसाइट अकाउंट कुकीज़ को अपने दोस्तों के साथ शेयर करें।
short.id: Bagikan cookie akun website dengan teman tanpa berbagi kata sandi.
short.it: Condividi i cookie del tuo account con gli amici senza condividere la password.
short.ja: パスワードを共有せずに、ウェブサイトアカウントのクッキーを友達と共有できます。
short.ko: 비밀번호 없이 웹사이트 계정 쿠키를 친구와 공유하세요.
short.ml: പാസ്‌വേഡ് പങ്കിടാതെ നിങ്ങളുടെ വെബ്‌സൈറ്റ് അക്കൗണ്ട് കുക്കികൾ സുഹൃത്തുക്കളുമായി പങ്കിടുക.
short.mr: पासवर्डशिवाय तुमच्या वेबसाइट अकाउंटचे कुकीज मित्रांसोबत शेअर करा.
short.nl: Deel website-accountcookies met vrienden zonder je wachtwoord te delen.
short.pl: Udostępniaj pliki cookie konta znajomym bez udostępniania hasła.
short.ro: Partajează cookie-urile contului de website cu prietenii fără a partaja parola.
short.ru: Делитесь куки своего аккаунта с друзьями без передачи пароля.
short.sv: Dela dina webbplatskonton-cookies med vänner utan att dela lösenord.
short.sw: Shiriki vidakuzi vya akaunti yako ya tovuti na marafiki bila kushiriki nenosiri.
short.ta: கடவுச்சொல் இல்லாமல் உங்கள் வலைத்தள கணக்கு குக்கீகளை நண்பர்களுடன் பகிரவும்.
short.te: పాస్‌వర్డ్ లేకుండా మీ వెబ్‌సైట్ ఖాతా కుకీలను స్నేహితులతో పంచుకోండి.
short.th: แชร์คุกกี้บัญชีเว็บไซต์กับเพื่อนโดยไม่ต้องแชร์รหัสผ่าน
short.tr: Web sitesi hesap çerezlerinizi şifre olmadan arkadaşlarınızla paylaşın.
short.uk: Діліться куками облікового запису веб-сайту з друзями без передачі пароля.
short.vi: Chia sẻ cookie tài khoản trang web với bạn bè mà không cần chia sẻ mật khẩu.
short.zh_CN: 无需登录密码即可与朋友共享网站账户Cookie。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Session Share - Login Sharing Made Easy 🎉

Want to share your favorite websites like Netflix and Amazon Prime with friends without giving them your password? With Session Share, you can easily share your login sessions safely and securely! 🔒

Key Features:
- Easy Sharing: Share your website sessions with friends in just a few clicks. 📲
- No Passwords Needed: Keep your passwords private while sharing access. 🔑
- Secure and Safe: Your data is protected with top-notch security. 🛡️
- Unlimited Sharing: Share as many sessions as you want with our flexible plans. 🔄
- Cross-Device Sync: Access your sessions from any device, anytime. 💻📱

How It Helps:
- Stay Connected: Share your favorite sites like Netflix and Amazon Prime with friends and family without hassle. 🎬🛍️
- Save Time: No need to log in and out repeatedly; just share your session. ⏰
- Peace of Mind: Your passwords stay safe, and you control who gets access. 🧘‍♂️

Premium Features ⭐:
- Unlimited Account Saving ($2.99/month or $14.99/year - Save 37%)
- Cloud Sync: Access your shared sessions across all devices
- Priority Support: Get help when you need it
- No Ads: Clean, distraction-free experience
- Advanced Security: Extra layer of protection for your sessions
- Share with Multiple Friends: Perfect for family sharing

Free vs Premium:
✨ Free: Save up to 2 accounts
🌟 Premium: Unlimited account sharing & saving + all premium features

Session Share makes it easy to share your online world with others while keeping your information secure. Perfect for students, families, and anyone who loves to share! Try Premium today and unlock the full sharing experience! 🌟
